trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Myrtle Beach
There was one other sighting in Myrtle Beach on or around October 24th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting out side my house watching the sky. In the corner of my eye I saw a ball of light in the sky reddish orangish color. I looked and it faded out. I shook it off and looked in the other direction. Then I looked back in curiosity and 3 bigs light were in the same as the one before. I got nervous so I yelled for my bother and he came outside. We watched it for a couple seconds and it's vanished again. The one light appeared again the 6 differnts lighted appeared right next to it in a line then they all vanished and that was it. Its the 3rd time I've seen this in the last 7 months
Summary: Pulsating lights that would appear then disappear
